message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.MA 

This paper deals with optimizing multi-stage campaigning over social networks, which involves modeling user activities as a multivariate Hawkes process and determining the optimal intervention policy. This falls under the categories of social networks (cs.SOC), data science (cs.DS), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and machine learning (cs.MA). Additionally, the use of dynamic programming to balance present rewards and future outcomes suggests the category of social influence (cs.SI).
